resources.string: This will open a webpage to log into AniList.co
Or paste in an auth token
Do you want to save changes?
Ignore feature (long press on media card) not enabled
Character alternative name spoiler warning icon
Anime News Network region chip state
Anime News Network category chip state
A work that is focused on characters physically fighting one another. This can involve or escalate to otherworldly levels.
A work depicting characters exploring and learning about their world. A focus should be on the travel from one location to the next.
A work that is focused on making the audience laugh.
A work that is intended to be more serious than comedic in tone, however comedy and drama are not mutually exclusive.
A work that takes place in a fantastical world as compared to our world. Typically has some focus on medieval settings but this is not required.
A work that is meant to evoke fear or disgust.
A work that has a significant focus on mechs. Will often be paired with Sci-Fi.

Also called \"magical girl,\" the mahou shoujo genre is centered around young girls that possess magical abilities, typically used through transformation sequences with a magical companion of some sort.
A work thats story has some focus on music, whether its the production or performance of music.
A work that has a focus on a mystery being solved. May be associated with crimes of some sort.
A work that focuses internal motivations and desires to explore the emotional and mental states of the characters/world.
A work that focuses on a romantic relationship being formed between characters.
"A work that has focuses on futuristic settings and technology. "
A work that focuses on the day to day lives of the characters. Will typically be mutually exclusive with Action, Adventure, and Thriller genres.
A work that focuses on a sport or competitive game of some sort.
A work that takes place in \"the real world\" but has fantastical elements in that world.
A work that focuses on inducing suspense, surprise, and anxiety in the viewer.
